nodes.text: The Malgan Market was a market on Onderon where many merchants and pedestrians walked.

Around 20 BBY, on the fifth day after the Onderon rebels came into Iziz, they destroyed several Separatist battle droids. Lux Bonteri tossed an electromagnetic pulse grenade into a group of B2 super battle droids, Saw Gerrera shot a droid who was checking a civilian's ID, Steela Gerrera shot a droid from a rooftop, and Rex and Dono took out a DSD1 dwarf spider droid.
While there were no civilian casualties or injuries during this attack, the public was still very alarmed at the situation.
